tourBios.otherInfo: Member of BUY.COM TOUR since 1999...finished season strong with three of his five top-10 finishes in the last five weeks including a fifth place finish at the 1999 TOUR Championship...was one shot off the lead after 36 holes of the 1999 Upstate Classic and finished tied for second in the rain-shortened 54-hole event...leader by two strokes after 36 holes at the 1999 Cleveland Open...was in second place, two strokes behind eventual winner Kelly Gibson after 36 holes at the 1999 Oregon Classic...biggest thrill in golf was when he qualified for the 1998 U.S. Open and finished tied for 53rd...made the cut and finished T53rd in his only PGA TOUR event to date...was the assistant superintendent at Franklin Hills CC in Detroit, MI in 1994...in 1995 worked as a John Deere Sales Representative...was an individual qualifier for the 1989 NCAA Golf Championships.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T2nd in 1999 at the NIKE Upstate Classic.
